00028 // usually the following should work; otherwise define OS_* manually:
00029 #if defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN64)
00030         #define OS_WIN   // for MS Windows (2000, XP, Vista, 7)
00031 #else
00032         #define OS_UNIX  // for Unix (Linux, Irix)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #ifdef OS_UNIX
00036         #include <unistd.h>
00037         #include <netdb.h>
00038         #include <sys/socket.h>
00039         #include <sys/time.h>
00040         #include <netinet/in.h>
00041         #include <arpa/inet.h>
00042 #endif
00043 #ifdef OS_WIN
00044         #include <ws2tcpip.h>
00045         #include <winsock2.h>
00046         #include <windows.h>
00047 #endif
